item.title: Privacy Statement
item.description: The personal information you enter on the site will be used for the purpose for which you provided the requested information. This information will not be given to third parties. In addition, Panel Insight uses B.V. The data to improve service to you. If you have any objections, you can report this to us via. Your data will be deleted immediately from the file. Your visit to this website is maintained by means of cookies.

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.description: Terms and Conditions This research is a collaboration between: Q & A research & consultancy and opinion polls: Opiniemeters is a trade name of Panel Inzicht BV, registered at the Chamber of Commerce under number 56080239. Q & A research & consultancy registered at the Chamber of Commerce under number 65029496 During a survey you will receive tickets (not always) for your participation for your time. These tickets are offered by the Q & A panel.
